amendment.description: Amendment authorizes the expenditure of funds for intelligence activities in Bosnia which had been previously appropriated in the Omnibus Appropriations Act for FY 1996.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 13 in the Congressional Record of May 21, 1996, authorizing the expenditure funds for intelligence activities in Bosnia which had been previously appropriated in the Omnibus Appropriations Act for FY 1996.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Combest amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
